replies.body: I'm kinda bummed my submission didn't make it, I'm not even sure if it passed the requirements tbh since it was a MIDI, but I'd like some feedback if it did pass the requirements, unsure if rito does that stuff.

Hey Curio, don't be discouraged! If music is your passion and creating music via MIDI is your thing then you should absolutely keep at it. Your submission was valid, but unfortunately didn't make the finalist cut. 

Musicality was one of the factors in picking the finalists and, being a MIDI track, it had to really knock it out of the park to take a spot.
The cover was very focused on the base chord progression rather than the melody. The soft-harp style as the main instrument over the constant drum beat was tough to get lost in and it became slightly repetitive. It was sitting somewhere between electro-pop and orchestral - going forward I'd look at hammering down the tone of your piece and supporting your melody to make it fuller.

Thanks for entering, hope this feedback helps you build out more music in the future!
It does, thanks!
dam not much people did it dam
It might look like that, but this actually just a shortlist for all of the participants. I'm sure heaps of people submitted their own songs, its just that these few have made it to the final stage.

HOLY WOW. I'm so torn.
Amazing efforts by all the Shortlisted. 
But that Lightbringer by Rain... but that Tara Lynn Cover... but that guitar work for As We Fall... but those vocal harmonies from dat cutie Elijah...
Thanks for doing something really different, and amazing.
Such Talent. Many Nice. Wow.

sorry didn't know this was happening, is there a place I can go to find the complete list of submissions? Even if they didn't get shortlisted I still want to support creativity by at least listening to what they spent hours creating

I'm pretty disappointed that mine didn't make the shortlist. Here it is:
https://youtu.be/X-I5COgx2Kg
This was very pleasant to listen too, shame you weren't a finalist. I would've voted for you and the other Lightbringer entry, both very well done covers.
That was nice. :) VERY different from the original, which is cool. Thanks for sharing your cover with us~

Hey Gispry,

We haven't listed all the submissions as yet - all the entries came through YouTube so if the content creators feel like posting theirs now for feedback or to show off their work, they absolutely should!
Yes, I agree with this! I'd love to hear what other League fans created. :)
Thank you very much Riot/Logitech for adding my cover to your shortlist! :D
Thank you for entering! {{champion:37}}
Too many Amumu covers
There are so many cool competitions, can i subscribe somewhere to know of competitions and events like this? I'd be super keen to do it with my otomatone if i had a chance XP (if just for giggles)

Hey Macheron, there isn't one specific place to subscribe to BUT whenever we run a contest, we typically announce on the Boards, with posts on the League Oceania Facebook and Twitter as well - and usually it pops up on the news tab of the League client for a while as well! So if you're checking in on any of those channels hopefully you'll see announcements as they come through.

We love running these contests and seeing all the amazing things people create. :D
I would love to see that instrumental metal one in the grand final. That is an epic cover.
I know a music company name is RIOT
